hint: Apply predicate pushdown and early filtering to reduce join sizes, convert implicit joins to explicit joins, and selectively pre-filter dimension tables before joining.
Isolate selective dimension filters (date, item, customer) into explicit CTEs, convert all comma joins to explicit JOIN syntax, and materialize only necessary filtered dimension subsets.
Pre-filter and materialize ALL dimension tables AND the fact table in separate CTEs, then join the pre-aggregated results. Use CTE materialization to force optimal join order.

Decompose the ROLLUP aggregation by computing base aggregates once in a CTE, then derive rollup levels separately. Transform implicit joins to explicit joins with early filtering to enable better plan choices.
